name: LAZERZOMBIES (Free)
description:
This is a free vertical slice of the full game, which will be released soon

Lazerzombies is a fast-paced, physics-based tactical shooter with a stealth and abilities system.  The Player has 6 abilities to get an advantage on enemies, that are unlocked in each level. Such as electric shock, slow motion, a remote detonator, flashlight, flare, and leaning around corners
Vertical slice has 9 levels in normal mode and 15 levels in speedrun and hardcore mode.
